name: NSBatchInsertRequest
desc: A request to insert a batch of data in a persistent store.

items.name: init(entity: NSEntityDescription, dictionaryHandler: (NSMutableDictionary) -> Bool)
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a managed entity, and specifies a closure that provides data dictionaries for insertion.

items.name: init(entity: NSEntityDescription, managedObjectHandler: (NSManagedObject) -> Bool)
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a managed entity, and specifies a closure that inserts data into the entity.

items.name: init(entityName: String, dictionaryHandler: (NSMutableDictionary) -> Bool)
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a named managed entity, and specifies a closure that provides data dictionaries for insertion.

items.name: init(entityName: String, managedObjectHandler: (NSManagedObject) -> Bool)
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a named managed entity, and specifies a closure that inserts data into the entity.

items.name: init(entity: NSEntityDescription, objects: [[String : Any]])
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a managed entity, and provides an array of data dictionaries for insertion.

items.name: init(entityName: String, objects: [[String : Any]])
items.desc: Creates a batch-insertion request for a named managed entity, and provides an array of data dictionaries for insertion.

items.name: var dictionaryHandler: ((NSMutableDictionary) -> Bool)?
items.desc: A closure that provides a dictionary for your app to insert data into.

items.name: var entity: NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: The managed entity to insert data into.

items.name: var entityName: String
items.desc: The name of the managed entity to insert data into.

items.name: var managedObjectHandler: ((NSManagedObject) -> Bool)?
items.desc: A closure that provides a managed object for your app to insert data into.

items.name: var objectsToInsert: [[String : Any]]?
items.desc: An array of dictionaries that represents the objects to insert with the keys as attribute names and their assigned values.

items.name: var resultType: NSBatchInsertRequestResultType
items.desc: The type of result that Core Data returns from this request.
